title.text: Security Update for Microsoft Virtual Server 2005 and Microsoft Virtual Server 2005 R2: x86 (KB937986)

description.text: A security issue has been identified that could allow elevation of privilege on virtual machines running Virtual Server 2005 and Virtual Server 2005 R2, 32-bit edition. You can help protect your computer by installing this update from Microsoft. After you install this item, you may have to restart your computer.
